flavor: You took part in delivering time-sensitive or high-risk parcels for House Orien, including diplomatic packets, rare magic items, and sealed containers about which no questions were asked. What places did you go, and how did you travel there: a fast horse or griffon, a lightning rail, or a teleportation portal? Did you ever fail to make a delivery, or find yourself unable to because something sinister happened to the recipient?
name: Orien Courier
